title: elegant serif to pair with whitney
content: im designing a magazine and was wondering which elegant serif would go nicely with whitney from h&fj
author: leibel

comments.content: I have a customer the uses Bembo quite a bit with Whitney. Looks rather nice I thought.

Mercury :-)  
Actually, almost anything that goes with Myriad would go with Whitney. I would concentrate on the serif by itself. It likely will match.
